div.head: CHAP. CL.
1 An exhortation to praise God, 3 with all kind of instruments.
div.ab: Praise ye the Lord. Praise God in his Sanctuarie: Praise him in the firmament of his power. Halleluiah.
Praise him for his mightie actes: Praise him according to his excellent greatnesse.
Praise him with the sound of the Trumpet: Prayse him with the Psalterie and Harpe. Or, Cornet.
Praise him with the timbrell and dance: praise him with stringed instruments, and Organes. Or, Pipe.
Praise him vpon the loud cymbals: praise him vpon the high sounding cymbals.
Let euery thing that hath breath, praise the Lord. Praise yee the Lord.
